Doc.Description: Search postal codes given the code

Param.name: text
Param.doc: Postal code code or local name

XSelect.XField: pc.code AS "postal_code", pc.name AS "postal_address_name", pc.local_name AS "postal_address_local_name", CONCAT(pc.code, " ", pc.name) AS "postal_address", pc.*

XWhere.XCondition: AND ( pc.code LIKE '{param->text}' OR pc.name LIKE '{param->text}' OR pc.local_name LIKE '{param->text}' )
